attributes.action: stop British Citizenship to be taught in UK schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many students have been complaining about being taught British Citizenship in school. Teachers are not qualified to teach the subject and don't have the capability to teach the subject itself. As well as an added Examination on the subject, students are not happy with the addition of the subject into the curriculum.

rejection.details: Please provide your full name and address and we will then reassess your petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
